channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israeli military captures Palestinian side of Rafah crossing
item.description: Israel's military said it has taken control of the Palestinian side of the Rafah crossing, a vital entry point for aid to Gaza on the Egyptian border. Follow for live updates.

item.title: 16 tornadoes reported in 6 states
item.description: The most destructive storm appeared to have been in Barnsdall, Oklahoma, north of Tulsa, where major damage was reported.

item.title: Deadly tornadoes reported in Oklahoma as severe threat continues today
item.description: Strong, long-lived tornadoes are possible in Oklahoma and Kansas on Monday as ingredients come together for a significant severe storm outbreak.

item.title: American detained in Russia for allegedly 'violating public order,' Moscow court says
item.description: An American visiting Russia was detained for "violating public order" and remanded in custody for 10 days, a Moscow court said Tuesday.

item.title: May 6, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israeli airstrikes killed multiple people in Rafah early Tuesday, Palestinian officials said.

item.title: Man who lived with mother charged with her murder after police find body in bathtub
item.description: A man who lived with his mother allegedly murdered her and left her body in the bathtub inside their shared home, police say.

item.title: The Met Gala 2024
item.description: The Met Gala, an annual, invitation-only event, was held Monday night in New York City.

item.title: US soldier detained in Russia on charges of criminal misconduct, Army says
item.description: A U.S. soldier was detained in Russia on Thursday, May 2, according to a U.S. official.

item.title: Witness testimony in Trump's hush money trial wraps for the day
item.description: Former President Donald Trump's hush money trial continues in New York. Follow here for the latest live news updates, analysis and more.

item.title: Series of bomb threats targeting LGBTQ+ Pride events in Montana deemed to be hoaxes
item.description: A series of bomb threats targeting annual Pride events in Montana were deemed to be hoaxes “used to try to dissuade people from participating” in the LGBTQ+ celebrations.
